item.title: Creating a Shading Model
item.description: Work in Progress This page is a current topic of research, some things may not be accurate. AuthorAlessa "Codekitten" BakerWIP5.2 Getting Started Implementing a custom shading model in Unreal Engine can be one of the most enjoyable and rewarding experiences, because it opens up so much more opportunity to experiment in custom rendering with minimal code changes. A lot of it comes down to just replicating an existing implementation of another shading model.
